tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_service_history (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  repair_date DATE,
  repair_type VARCHAR(50),
  repair_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    vin VARCHAR(17)
 );

 CREATE TABLE service_history (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_type VARCHAR(255),
    service_description VARCHAR(1000),
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle(vehicle_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR,
    model VARCHAR,
    year INT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician VARCHAR,
    cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Repair (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_description VARCHAR,
    parts_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceHistory (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    event_date DATE,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    event_description VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecord (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id),
  maintenance_type TEXT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RepairRecord (
  repair_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id),
  repair_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RepairAssignment (
  assignment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES Vehicle(vehicle_id),
  repair_id INT REFERENCES RepairRecord(repair_id),
  technician_id INT REFERENCES Technician(technician_id),
  assignment_date DATE NOT NULL
);
